Name: Shark Simulator
About the game: Shark Simulator is a WTF physics sandbox. Play as Ed the shark, and give those tourists a vacation they will remember! Shark Simulator is about causing as much trouble as you can on a paradise island. Wreck an entire city using nothing but your jaw (at least in the beginning). Key Features You can be a shark Discover a paradise island full of surprises Tons of tourists to slaughter Fierce cops eager to hunt you down Mighty equipments to help you rule the world Powerful weapons to make a true war machine out of you Spend your hard-earned money in many shops
